name: Finni Health
headline: Empowering Autism Care Providers to Go Independent
description: Our platform is simple: we provide everything providers need to go independent, from scheduling and billing to marketing and client support.

founders.name: Yilun Chen, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder of Finni Health. Formerly the youngest Senior Engineer at Shopify Plus and Head of Data at Swyft. Berkeley '18. Ocean lover.

## We employ the top ABA therapists and get care started faster than typical providers
[Get Started](https://www.finnihealth.com/<http:/parents.finnihealth.com/inquire>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c5b363857a0f_erpert-image.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/62d6ba2801c80f7ecf7feac9_expoert-mobile.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c50a12857a11_expert-cartoon.svg)

In-home therapy
## We know how difficult coordinating schedules can be. Thatâ€™s why our therapists provide care where your child feels most comfortable
## The Finni Difference
[Start Care](https://www.finnihealth.com/<http:/parents.finnihealth.com/inquire>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/62d6b9c7b05a0c31738e3070_difference.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c5e124857a15_right.svg)
### Insurance Covered Care
Our team calls your insurance and negotiates the best rates for your family. We will work with you to get the care your kiddo needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c5e124857a15_right.svg)
### Work around your location
Scheduling is often the most difficult part of care, we make it convenient by working around your location!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c5e124857a15_right.svg)
### Personalized care for your family
We know it takes a village to take on ASD, that's why we provide full parent training and resources to all our families.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c50513857a16_Difference-cartoon.svg)
## Our Process
[Start Care](https://www.finnihealth.com/<http:/parents.finnihealth.com/inquire>)
1
### Intake
We take the time to learn more about your child and help build some goals. 
2
### Assessment
We will build a therapy plan tailored to the entire family including parent training.
3
### Start
We start therapy when you are ready to begin the journey. 
## ABA provides transformational outcomes
Children who are enrolled in autism care improve their behaviors by an average of 80%Â¹
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c5669f857a17_Rectangle%20175.png)

Providers
## Our experts are on your side
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/6297d5d89ac9c5221e857a30_Frame%20563.png)
## Monique Lujan
## MS, BCBA
Monique Lujan has over 9 yearsâ€™ experience implementing and developing programming for children and young adults with autism and other developmental delays. She also has extensive experience in talent acquisition and retainment, onboarding, administrative oversight, and support of Registered Behavior Techniciansâ„¢ (RBT) and Board Certified Behavior Analysts (BCBA). Her continued love of ABA drove Monique to continue her education and earn her M.S. in Applied Behavior Analysis pass the BACB boards and become a Board-Certified Behavior Analystâ„¢ (BCBA).
[Start Care](https://www.finnihealth.com/<http:/parents.finnihealth.com/inquire>)
## MS, BCBA, LBA
## Erin Malicek
Erin Malicek has 10 years of experience in the field of Applied Behavior Analysis. She has worked in clinic, home and school settings implementing compassionate based care to clients. She also has experience in training RBTS, supervising new behavior analysts in the field and providing support to parents. Erin has her M.S in Applied Behavior Analysis, is licensed in the state of Virginia (LBA) and is a Board-Certified Behavior Analyst. Outside of work she loves hanging out with her three sons and husband exploring Virginia! 
[Start Care](https://www.finnihealth.com/<http:/parents.finnihealth.com/inquire>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6297d5d89ac9c5b4308579e1/63b87983e27f73079a1072e7_erin-headshot.jpg)
Are you a care provider?

## Monique Lujan
## MS, BCBA
Monique Lujan has over 9 yearsâ€™ experience implementing and developing programming for children and young adults with autism and other developmental delays. She also has extensive experience in talent acquisition and retainment, onboarding, administrative oversight, and support of Registered Behavior Techniciansâ„¢ (RBT) and Board Certified Behavior Analysts (BCBA). Her continued love of ABA drove Monique to continue her education and earn her M.S. in Applied Behavior Analysis pass the BACB boards and become a Board-Certified Behavior Analystâ„¢ (BCBA).
Start CareâŸ¨6âŸ©
## MS, BCBA, LBA
## Erin Malicek
Erin Malicek has 10 years of experience in the field of Applied Behavior Analysis. She has worked in clinic, home and school settings implementing compassionate based care to clients. She also has experience in training RBTS, supervising new behavior analysts in the field and providing support to parents. Erin has her M.S in Applied Behavior Analysis, is licensed in the state of Virginia (LBA) and is a Board-Certified Behavior Analyst. Outside of work she loves hanging out with her three sons and husband exploring Virginia!

generated_description:
### Summary of Finni Health

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2022, Finni Health is a health-tech startup based in San Francisco, part of Y Combinator's Batch W23. With a committed team of eight employees, it focuses on empowering autism care providers to become independent. The core mission is straightforward: to equip these providers with everything they need, from scheduling and billing to marketing and client support.

**Mission**  
Finni Health aims to empower autism care providers, giving them the tools they need to operate autonomously. They understand that independence can lead to better service delivery and enhanced client satisfaction.

**Services Offered**  
Finni Health provides a variety of services to support families with autism, including:
- **Play Therapy:** Helping children set and achieve goals through play.
- **Autism Care:** Delivering supportive, collaborative assistance to families.
- **Developmental Counseling:** Supporting learning through meaningful interactions.
- **Pediatric Diagnosis:** Facilitating referrals to psychologists and pediatricians.
- **Parent Training:** Equipping parents with tools to effectively partner in their child's care.

**Expansion and Availability**  
Finni Health is rapidly expanding its reach across the United States, with services already available in various states, including Colorado, Connecticut, Georgia, Illinois, Michigan, Missouri, New Mexico, and New York.

**Unique Selling Proposition**  
The Finni difference lies in their quick service initiation. They employ top ABA (Applied Behavior Analysis) therapists and adapt to the family's location for convenience. Furthermore, they handle insurance negotiations, ensuring families receive the best rates and coverage.

**Leadership and Support**  
With Michael Seibel as their Group Partner, Finni Health not only draws from his guidance but reflects an innovative spirit characteristic of companies nurtured in the Y Combinator ecosystem. They also provide comprehensive support and training to families, recognizing that managing autism care requires a community effort.

**Website**  
For more information about their offerings and to get started, visit [Finni Health](https://www.finnihealth.com/).

In essence, Finni Health is treading an exciting path in the health-tech arena, doing meaningful work that impacts families and practitioners alikeâ€”and they're just getting started.
